name: Feed the bunny (SteBee)
description:
Feed the bunny is an idle, clicker, incremental game with the goal to become the richest bunny ever.

Get carrots by clicking on the bunny, upgrade your tools and level up friends for help.

The game starts pretty easy and you should reach the first prestige in under one hour.

But it will get harder with every prestige. Try your best!

The game is under developement. Most of the game functions should work properly but...

In this early phase it can happen that your save game is deleted when I update the game. So please export your game from time to time. The imports should work fine.

I tested with Edge, Chrome and Firefox. 

It works fine with Edge and Chrome. These are recommended.

In Firefox there are save/load issues. Think on exporting your game to text files when testing.

If it works on other browsers too, please tell me in the chat.

You can help with the further developement of the game:
  • If you find bugs
  • If balancing is too soft or hard
  • If you desire additional features
  • If you see spelling mistakes

Please tell me in the chat or write an e-mail to me.

Planned upgrades for the game
  • Final balancing with your help
  • Add quests for the bunny
  • Auto buy upgrades
  • More prestige upgrade options
  • Multi buy buttons
  • Many more
My story

I released my first game: "Cinema Clicker" on Kongregate in 2016 with 15k+ plays. 
Since the expenses for the project were significantly higher than what I got as revenue, I first had to save a little so that I could afford to publish a second game. :-) But here it is and I hope you enjoy it.
